system.Text:
__When you face mental strain, shock, or despair__, suffer -1 spirit for minor stress, -2 for serious stress, or -3 for major stress. If your spirit is 0, @Compendium[foundry-ironsworn.starforgedmoves.93d2d69b7e2b85e1]{Lose Momentum} equal to any remaining stress.

Then, if your spirit is 0 or you choose to resist the stress, roll +spirit or +heart, whichever is higher.

On a __strong hit__, choose one.

  * Shake it off: If you are not shaken, take +1 spirit
  * Embrace the darkness: Take +1 momentum

On a __weak hit__, if you are not shaken, you may @Compendium[foundry-ironsworn.starforgedmoves.93d2d69b7e2b85e1]{Lose Momentum} (-1) in exchange for +1 spirit. Otherwise, press on.

On a __miss__, it's worse than you thought. Suffer an additional -1 spirit or @Compendium[foundry-ironsworn.starforgedmoves.93d2d69b7e2b85e1]{Lose Momentum} (-2). If your spirit is 0, you must also mark shaken or traumatized, or roll on the table below.
